molinberry.title: Pinacolada
molinberry.description: Malibu Pinacolada by Molin Berry. Molin berry flavours are imported from Poland.

molinberry.title: Strawberry
molinberry.description: Beloved by everyone. Sweet & juicy strawberry is attractive to vanilla cream, chocolate and many more. Produced in EU.

molinberry.description: Eden Apple by Molin Berry. Molin berry flavours are imported from Poland. Concentrated flavoring. Produced in EU.

flavorah.title: Banana
flavorah.description: Banana by Flavorah. Smooth banana flavor. Great as a rich base for mixing with other flavors.
